headline.print_headline: Lester Breslow, Who Linked Healthy Habits and Long Life, Dies at 97
headline.seo: Lester Breslow, Who Tied Good Habits to Longevity, Dies at 97
headline.main: Lester Breslow, Who Linked Healthy Habits and Long Life, Dies at 97

docs.abstract: Dr Lester Breslow, public health leader whose research gave mathematical proof to the notion that people can live longer and healthier by changing habits like smoking, diet and sleep, dies at age 97.
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Breslow was a public health leader whose research gave mathematical proof to the notion that people can live longer and healthier by changing habits like smoking, diet and sleep.
docs.snippet: Dr. Breslow was a public health leader whose research gave mathematical proof to the notion that people can live longer and healthier by changing habits like smoking, diet and sleep.
